title: NY Film Festival
seo_title: NY Film Festival - Luxury Hotels NYC - Best Hotels in Midtown Manhattan
preview: Each fall, the Film Society of Lincoln Center hosts one of the country’s most prestigious film festivals, showcasing the best of new cinema, restored classics, and an Avant-Garde showcase.
contents:
September 25 through October 11.

Each fall, the Film Society of Lincoln Center hosts one of the country’s most prestigious film festivals, showcasing the best of new cinema, restored classics, and an Avant-Garde showcase. This year, expect several world premieres from top directors like Steven Spielberg, as well as U.S. premieres of films fresh from wins at Cannes, starring the likes of A-Listers like Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet, Tom Hanks and Cate Blanchette.


For more information and tickets, visit the NYFF website.
